name: A.1F19X-Ryl
flavor: Trepanning is the art of cutting the skull open to let the gods in.

name: Acheron SR5
flavor: Tiled with picocircuitry, the Acheron SR5 is fiendishly accurate and hungry to grow.

name: Another NitC
flavor: Hammer it home.

name: B-Line Trauma
flavor: Take one to the forehead and call me in the morning.

name: Badger CCL
flavor: Badger-baiting is a blood sport.

name: Boolean Gemini
flavor: Fight your way!

name: Bronzed Yamaduta SR4
flavor: An accurized Omolon scout rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Caelum
flavor: A Guardian relic named for the chisel of the night sky.

name: Cocytus SR4
flavor: The Omolon Cocytus SR4 will drown your enemies in a river of pain.

name: Colovance's Duty
flavor: A precision-fire weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Crusader I
flavor: Executor-issued precision weapon for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Crypt Dweller SR1
flavor: A marskman's weapon modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Cryptic Dragon
flavor: Those who doubt the existence of dragons are always the first devoured.

name: Deadshot Luna SR1
flavor: Precision firepower modified to fit the exacting specifications of Dead Orbit's expanding arsenal.

name: Doom of Chelchis
flavor: "Where is the Great Machine? Where is the Great Machine?" —Chelchis, Kell of Stone

name: Fang of Ir Yût
flavor: This is the shape and the point of the tooth: nothing has ever lived that will not die.

name: Fate of All Fools
flavor: "The wise man knows his fate. The fool merely finds it.”

name: Foresight 3
flavor: I foresee death; and we are its author.

name: Gallows Cure
flavor: It just might save your neck.

name: Garmr SR1
flavor: Death is hungry.

name: Gheleon's Demise
flavor: A precision-fire weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Gladius 77
flavor: It bears a classic mark along the trigger guard: 'This Machine Kills Fallen'

name: Hand of Judgment
flavor: Those who have wronged us will be judged.

name: Harrowed Doom of Chelchis
flavor: "Where is the Great Machine? Where is the Great Machine?" —Chelchis, Kell of Stone

name: High Road Soldier
flavor: The survival of civilization depends on our willingness to choose conscience over expedience.

name: Hung Jury SR4
flavor: A scout rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Hygiea Noblesse
flavor: The Reef Cryptarchy's Hygiea Division is its largest, with over half of the asteroid devoted to their sprawling libraries.

name: Jigoku SR2
flavor: Semi-automatic rifle. The SR2 is a flexible weapons platform, built for any kind of battle.

name: Jigoku SR2-SL
flavor: Semi-automatic rifle. The SR2-SL variant is a multirole rifle, retooled for easy maintenance.

name: Jigoku SR3
flavor: Briefly marred by a panic over explosive misfires, the SR3 proved itself as a capable multirole rifle.

name: Jigoku SR3-SL
flavor: The flexible SR3-SL features a mag-float barrel and a self-maintaining receiver assembly.

name: Lampad SR4
flavor: Let your enemies know: death will be their only companion.

name: Last Extremity
flavor: For when you think you have nothing left to give.

name: Lethe Noblesse
flavor: Do not forget. Never forgive.

name: MIDA Multi-Tool
flavor: Select application: Ballistic engagement. Entrenching tool. Avionics trawl. Troll smasher. Stellar sextant. List continues.

name: Mitternacht SR2
flavor: Semi-automatic rifle. Built to score snap kills under heavy suppression, the lightweight Mitternacht handles like a dream.

name: Mitternacht SR3
flavor: The polymer-ceramic SR3 is a lightweight weapon built to receive very heavy scopes.

name: NA3D1 Salvation State
flavor: Save yourself to save them all.

name: Naraka SR5
flavor: There will always be new hells to conquer.

name: NL Shadow 701X
flavor: ...most just call it death.

name: Not Like the Others
flavor: You always knew you were different.

name: One/One Synesthete
flavor: "I knew an Exo who could taste velocity. Said his favorite flavor was one kilometer per second."

name: Orphne SR4
flavor: If death is the Darkness's way, let our Light defy their desire.

name: Painted Abaddon SR5
flavor: A single-fire Omolon firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Painted Song SR5
flavor: A powerful Omolon firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Pallas Regime
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Parallax PSm
flavor: Could there be another?

name: Pickpocket Saint
flavor: Take what's yours.

name: Primed Dìyù SR5
flavor: A long range Omolon firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Primed Midnight SR5
flavor: A fine-tuned Omolon firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Primed Yamaduta S4
flavor: A tactically flexible Omolon scout rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Proxima Centauri II
flavor: Just one…gentle…tap.

name: Pulwar V/Ace
flavor: Null-mass constellations give this rifle a featherweight heft.

name: Radial PSm
flavor: Where aren't you going?

name: Rainmaster V4
flavor: There's a storm inside.

name: Shinigami SR1
flavor: Death comes for the City's foes. Let's not keep it waiting.

name: Silvered Kín SR5
flavor: A highly accurate Omolon firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Singularity S.3
flavor: An accurized Vanguard-issue scout rifle, harmonically tuned for precision fire.

name: Stalker BNGL
flavor: They are all your prey.

name: SUROS BVV-13
flavor: Precise. Punchy. Unerring. SUROS.

name: SUROS DIS-43
flavor: Balanced. Targeted. Empowered. SUROS.

name: SUROS DIS-47
flavor: Rapid. Punchy. Relentless. SUROS.

name: SUROS SCO-43
flavor: Ferocious. Precise. Consistent. SUROS.

name: SUROS WSC-17
flavor: High firing speed meets flexible layout in the Suros WSC-17.

name: Thanatos SR5
flavor: Where Death follows, new life will grow. Where new life grows... Death will follow.

name: The Aries Nemesis X4
flavor: I teach harsh lessons.

name: The Calling
flavor: A marksman's weapon named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Inward Lamp
flavor: Of all the lights in all of space, none burn so bright as this.

name: The Inward Lamp (Adept)
flavor: Of all the lights in all of space, none burn so bright as this.

name: The Jade Rabbit
flavor: “What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?”

name: The Saterienne Rapier
flavor: To the death!

name: The Scholar
flavor: You can't pull an all-nighter when the sun never sets.

name: The Scholar (Adept)
flavor: An elite trophy earned only by Trials of Osiris champions.

name: Tlaloc
flavor: Release the storm. Hold nothing back.

name: Touch of Malice
flavor: "Let them feel every lash, every curse, every touch of malice that they first dealt to me." —Eris Morn

name: Trax Callum I
flavor: Semi-automatic rifle. This is a marksman's design, built for precision.

name: Trax Callum II
flavor: Semi-automatic rifle. This is a marksman's design, built for precision.

name: Trax Callum II-A
flavor: Semi-automatic rifle. This is a multirole variant with well-balanced capabilities.

name: Trax Devotio III
flavor: You pledged yourself to the study of ancient power.

name: Trax Elan IV
flavor: In the smallest spaces dwells the greatest power.

name: Trax Mallus II
flavor: Semi-automatic rifle. Accurized and fitted with harmonic dampers for long-range work.

name: Trax Mallus III
flavor: This marksman rifle features a smart gel barrel bath usually found on sophisticated precision weapons.

name: Trax Onus III
flavor: This power is your privilege, and your burden.

name: Treads Upon Stars
flavor: Ghost has tried to translate this weapon's inscription, but the Cabal language has proven difficult to parse.

name: Tuonela SR4
flavor: Hell will freeze over before the Omolon Tuonela SR4 will fail you.

name: Válka SR2
flavor: Semi-automatic rifle. Designed for precision fire in tangled ruins, the Válka is easy to handle and quick to aim.

name: Válka SR3
flavor: Contentious and light, a favorite of Guardians who demand a rifle that will never slow them down.

name: Vesta Noblese
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Vision of Confluence
flavor: What you have seen will mark you forever.

name: Wolves' Leash
flavor: Collecting pelts is a good business. Round 'em up.

name: Wolves' Leash II
flavor: Collecting pelts is a good business. Round 'em up.

name: Wyestar X9
flavor: The mag-float barrel drifts in a perfect vacuum, insulated from outside shock.

name: Xibalba SR5
flavor: Tiled with picocircuitry, the Xibalba SR5 is fiendishly accurate and hungry to grow.

name: Zero Point LOTP
flavor: This much fun should be outlawed.

name: Burning Eye
flavor: "Turn your eyes inward, upon your ideal self." —Parables of the Allspring

name: CHAOS DOGMA~
flavor: ~consume enhance replicate consume enhance replicate~ will drown your enemies—

name: Cryptic Dragon
flavor: Those who doubt the existence of dragons are always the first devoured.

name: The Distant Star
flavor: Forged in honor of Efrideet, she whose watchful eye guarded us from afar.

name: Angel's Advocate
flavor: "Just… Come on. Just don't."

name: Keystone 01
flavor: A precision weapon, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: The Hero Formula
flavor: It's just so satisfying!

name: The Wounded
flavor: A marksman's weapon, named and sanctified by the Future War Cult's leaders.

name: ((CHAOS DOGMA~))
flavor: ~replicate(pain) consume(enemies) OVERRIDE sig(gunsmith)~

name: Doom of Chelchis (Adept)
flavor: "All is silent. Nothing answers me. The hunger comes." —Chelchis, Kell of Stone

name: Fang of Ir Yût (Adept)
flavor: Bite deep, through reality, through the illusions of life and death, and eat what you find.

name: Vision of Confluence (Adept)
flavor: In the abyss of time, all the lines converge... upon you.
